alert.note: Alert for Hillsborough; Merrimack; Rockingham (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 13 at 8:43PM EDT until September 13 at 9:45PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Gray Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Rockingham County in southern New Hampshire... Central Hillsborough County in southern New Hampshire... Southeastern Merrimack County in central New Hampshire... * Until 945 PM EDT. * At 843 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over New Boston, or 11 miles northwest of Merrimack, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Manchester, Nashua, Derry, Merrimack, Bedford, Milford, Hooksett, Amherst, Litchfield, Hollis, New Boston, Epsom, Mont Vernon, Lyndeborough, Francestown, Mason, Goffstown, Mount Vernon, Weare and Hudson. This includes the following highways... Interstate 293 between mile markers 1 and 11. Interstate 93 between mile markers 9 and 34. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
